sentences: Gary Nichols (born 1978 in Muscle Shoals, Alabama) is an American country music singer.
Signed to Mercury Nashville Records in 2006, Nichols made his debut that year with the release of his single "Unbroken Ground", which reached No. 39 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts.
In April 2010, he replaced Chris Stapleton as the lead singer and guitarist of The SteelDrivers.
After seven successful years and leading the band to win its first Grammy, Gary departed in August 2017.
He released a solo album titled "Field Of Plenty" on Merrimack Records the same year.
